sentences.en: A Wall Street Journal editorial encapsulated the views of many conservatives.
sentences.cn: 《华尔街日报》的一篇社论概述了很多保守派人士的观点。

sentences.en: He has been on the editorial staff of "Private Eye" since 1963.
sentences.cn: 自1963年以来，他一直是《第三只眼》杂志的编辑。

sentences.en: He has said he will fire editorial employees without regard to seniority.
sentences.cn: 他说过不管资历如何，任何编辑人员他都有可能解雇。

sentences.en: He turned to an editorial and began reading it with interest.
sentences.cn: 他翻到里面的一篇论文,津津有味地读起来.

sentences.en: I was promoted to editor and then editorial director.
sentences.cn: 我先是被提升为编辑，然后又晋升为编务总监。

sentences.en: In an editorial, The Independent suggests the victory could turn nasty.
sentences.cn: 《独立报》在一篇社论中暗示这场胜利可能会变味。

sentences.en: In an editorial, The New York Times suggests the victory could turn nasty.
sentences.cn: 在一篇社论中，《纽约时报》认为该胜利会转成恶梦。

sentences.en: Last night I read the editorial over again.
sentences.cn: 我昨晚又重读了那篇社论.
她是个效率很高的编辑.

sentences.en: The chief editorial writer also blames weak leadership for the current crisis.
sentences.cn: 首席社论员也把当前的危机归咎于领导层软弱无力。

sentences.en: The community besieged the newspaper with letters about its recent editorial.
sentences.cn: 公众纷纷来信对报社新近发表的社论提出诘问,弄得报社应接不暇.

sentences.en: The editorial had an antiunion slant.
sentences.cn: 这篇社论有一种反工会的倾向.
这篇社论的 题目 是《.. . 》.

sentences.en: We now bring you the full text of the Renmin Ribao editorial.
sentences.cn: 现在全文广播《人民日报》社论.

sentences.en: Your editorial blithely ignores the hard facts.
sentences.cn: 你的社论全然无视铁一般的事实。

words.tran_cn: 以编辑身份地；以社论形式
编者，编辑；社论撰写人；编辑装置
编辑；校订；编辑或主笔地位
发表社论；（在报纸等的文章中）加编者按语
（就某事）发表社论；插入主观评论

trans.tran_en: relating to the preparation of a newspaper, book, television programme etc for printing or broadcasting
a piece of writing in a newspaper that gives the editor’s opinion about something, rather than reporting facts
